vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
παρα-κύπτω,
poetry παρκύπτω, stoop sideways, of the attitude of a bad harp-player, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; lean over a railing, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II stoop for the purpose of looking, and so,
__II.1 look sideways at, cast a careless glance on a thing, παρακύψαντ᾽ ἐπὶ τὸν τῆς πόλεως πόλεμον [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II.2 peep out of a door or window, ἐκ θυρίδος [Refs 5th c.BC+]; of girls peeping after a lover, [LXX+3rd c.BC+]; π. τὸν ἐραστὴν ἰδεῖν so as to see him, [Refs 1st c.AD+] a hope of safety peeped out, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ὀδόντων παρακυψάντων, of the first teeth, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]: followed by an interrogative clause, peep out and see, π. τίς ἄνεμος πνεῖ [Refs 2nd c.AD+] — passive, θυρίδες παρακυπτόμεναι probably out of which people look, [LXX]
__II.3 of persons outside a place, peep in, look in, εἰς οἰκίαν[LXX+NT]; παρακύψας βλέπει[NT+2nd c.AD+]; of a thing, appear in, ἐς ἀρχόν [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.4 meddle with, πράγματι [Refs 3rd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to bend over; to look (intently) stoop
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to bend over; to look (intently) stoop
to stoop beside; to stoop down, in order to take a view, Lk. 24:12; Jn. 20:5, 11; to bestow a close and attentive look, to look intently, to penetrate, Jas. 1:25; 1Pet. 1:12*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (好奇地屈身) 看
2) (思想上,想要發現) 查考
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) (好奇地屈身) 看
2) (思想上,想要发现) 查考
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cúi xuống; cúi xuống và nhìn vào. παρά (G3844) + κύπτω (G2955)
